Title: Requires a phone company to restore service promptly when phone service goes down for someone who uses a medical alert system or a device that transmits medical data
Summary: Requires a phone company to restore service promptly when phone service goes down for someone who uses a medical alert system or a device that transmits medical data.
LawCode: Add ยง91-b, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to requiring a phone company to restore service promptly when phone service goes down for someone who uses a medical alert system or a device that transmits medical data
